channel.title: Silab item help
channel.description:
lol ok i need a few things
need the pickup command updated(you know to be able to do like ::pickup 11000 1 ) need to add specials and when i make commands where do i add them?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2007, 09:37:55 AM[/size][hr]anyone help?

item.title: Silab item help
item.dc:creator: @Geoffrey11 Geoffrey11
item.description:
@Geoffrey11 wrote:

replace you pick up with this if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }[code][/code]

Read full topic
